item.title: MIUI 22.3.3 Recovery update for Xiaomi 12X China
item.description:
New Weekly Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12X China

Codename: psyche

Version: 22.3.3 | 12.0

Size: 4.3 GB

MD5: None

Changelog:
Bug fixes and system optimizations.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V13.0.13.0.RLDCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12X China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12X China

Codename: psyche

Version: V13.0.13.0.RLDCNXM | 11.0

Size: 5.9 GB

MD5: 232defbb853c6f734036d1da1ff53b61

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to January 2022. Increased system security.
Improved system stability
[Floating windows]
Fix: Floating windows froze in some cases
[Themes]
Fix: Default theme was restored unexpectedly in some cases
[Camera]
Optimization: Image quality
Fix: The Camera app was force closed in some cases
[Other]
New: Beautify for WeChat video calls
New: Partial screenshots
Optimization: Fingerprint unlock
Optimization: A feature that allows ignoring accidental touch on the edges

Download: Here
